rm_plot.dev_notes: tutorial level for the first shooter

lines.text: WTF is this place?!
Welcome to the world of the wax.
World of the Wax?
I am the god of the Wax.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Yes, World of the wax. Wax World.
*Whispering* What kind of explanation is this??

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: I can hear you.
Yes, World of the wax. Wax World.
*Whispering* What kind of explanation is this??
I can hear you.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Last year, you bought a box of candles and leave them beside the window.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: And then you never think of them.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: They are all melted right now.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: You killed these candles without lighting them!

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Such a waste!

choices.text: How should I get out of here?

choices.speaker: Wax God
choices.text: Look around. There are melted wax everywhere.

choices.speaker: Wax God
choices.text: This boxed-wax-world is ruined because of you!
** How am I responsible to this?? **

choices.speaker: Wax God
choices.text: You need to collect all these wax and remake them back into candles!

choices.speaker: Wax God
choices.text: You need to pay for what you did.

choices.speaker: Wax God
choices.text: Complete each level to collect the wax.
This man is totally sick! They are just candles!
Fine! Guess I'll just have to do what he just said.

beginning.dev_notes: narrative at the beginning of the rm_tutorial1

lines.text: OMG gun. This is sick!
Wait, wait, wait wait wait!! What happened to my body?!

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: As a punishment, you are a candle man right now.
Fineeee! **Will I die if I'm lighted for a long time?**
But I haven't take my shooting lessons yet!

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Hopefully you will be able to use it properly.

beginning.dev_notes: narrative at the beginning of the rm_level1

lines.text: Killer Maya is Here! Hahaha....AHHHHHH!

ending.dev_notes: narrative at the end of the rm_level1

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: You are less useless than I thought.
Ha? How useless do you think I am?

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: This is your award for collecting all the red waxes.

beginning.dev_notes: this dialogue should appear after the player switched the hero to vendure

lines.text: OMG my body! It's back!
How can you call giving somebody's body back is an award?
I have my body back? Can I even sound more miserable?
OK let's see what my body can do in this piece of wax world.

beginning.dev_notes: narrative at the beginning of rm_level2

lines.text: Ha! Let's see what I can do with two bodies.

ending.dev_notes: narrative at the end of rm_level2

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Conguatulations on collecting all the orange waxes.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: You will be awarded.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: But I need to remind you, this is just a beginning.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Wish you good luck.

beginning.dev_notes: narrative at the beginning of rm_tutorial3

lines.text: What would be the reward for this time?

middle.dev_notes: narrative after the UI page jumped out

lines.text: New gun...
So FUCKING COOOL!!
You dumb batmans, wait to die!!

ending.dev_notes: narrative at the end of rm_level3

lines.text: I AM the BEST! HaHa

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: To be honest, I am surprised that you are still alive.
*Upsetting* What do you mean?

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Just telling the truth.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Things will be a lot harder after this level.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: The reward for collecting all the green waxes would be another gun.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Hope you can still laugh after next level.

beginning.dev_notes: narrative at the beginning of rm_tutorial4

lines.text: New gun! Hahaha! I'm about to rule the wax world!

middle.dev_notes: narrative appears after the UI page jumps out

lines.text: Slay Maya!

beginning.dev_notes: narrative at the beginning of rm_level4

lines.text: Hmm, no dumb batmans?
Seems like I don't need him to wish me good luck at all.

ending.dev_notes: narrative at the end of rm_level4

lines.text: Shit, I'm so FUCKING tired.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: I warned ya.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Now you have collected red, orange, green and blue waxes.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Survive the last one.

beginning.dev_notes: narrative at the beginning of rm_level5

lines.text: I feel no sign of good luck...

ending.dev_notes: narrative at the end of rm_level5

lines.text: Finally the end. Phew...

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: I can't believe you made it.
I thought God knows everything, or at least, my ability.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: I would say I didn't see any ability on you. Except wasting
??! You are mean, mean, Mean Mean God.

lines.speaker: Wax God
lines.text: Nevermind, you made it. I will let you go back to the reality.

rm_ending_plot.dev_notes: the player wakes up finding themself in their bed

lines.text: I'm back! I'm back!
It's like a dream...
The candles!
I should add my shooting lessons to the agenda...
